name: MEC Stratosphere Hoodie - Youths
description:
A long, warm hoodie that keeps weight low and comfort high. In a world of cotton hoodies, the Stratosphere stands out, it is lighter, easier to pack and quick-drying. Made from a super-soft fleece, this hoodie is great over a tee around town or layered under a shell on a chilly hike.Crafted from a brushed polyester fleece that holds in warmth and wicks away moisture.Dropped hemline provides more coverage and leaves room to grow.Raglan sleeves keep movement free and work well will pack straps.Large, soft hood ups the comfort factor.Name tag on the inside reduces confusion after sleep overs or around camp.

        Sustainability
